T02TD2121E:161a-0: @161a ` // dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2121E:161a-2: mandal tshad dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2121E:161a-3: ba'i rnam lnga byugs la badzra re khe h'um zhes pas dri zhim po'i 'de gu byas la byug pa bya /
T02TD2121E:161a-4: aom ham ma h'a me r ba ye na ma: / aom ya:ga dza ratn'a ya na ma:aom ya:ga dza ranta ya na ma: aom ra pu ru sha ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161a-5: aom wa st'i ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161a-6: aom wa aa shva ranta ya na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161a-7: aom ma khadga ratna ya na ma /
T02TD2121E:161a-8: aom ra ma ni ratna ya na ma:aom wa:sarba ni dhi kum bh'a ya na ma: aom la tsa kra ratna ya nam: / de ltar me tog tshom bu dgu dgur bya'o //
T02TD2121E:161a-11: aa tsanda mandal zhes gdan dbul lo //
T02TD2121E:161a-12: gdan de'i steng du tsandri pa la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams sbyan drangs la /
T02TD2121E:161a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02TD2121E:161a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2121E:161a-16: dkon mchog gsum gyi rtsa ba ste //
T02TD2121E:161a-17: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2121E:161a-19: de nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2121E:161a-20: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD2121E:161a-21: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02TD2121E:161a-22: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
T02TD2121E:161a-23: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
T02TD2121E:161a-24: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
T02TD2121E:161b-0: gti mug @161b blo ste gti mug sel //
T02TD2121E:161b-1: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
T02TD2121E:161b-2: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
T02TD2121E:161b-3: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
T02TD2121E:161b-4: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02TD2121E:161b-5: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2121E:161b-6: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02TD2121E:161b-9: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02TD2121E:161b-11: aom badza nee bi dye h'um /
T02TD2121E:161b-14: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul /
T02TD2121E:161b-15: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2121E:161b-16: de nas dge ba'i rtsa bar bsdo'o //
T02TD2121E:161b-17: de nas yi dam gyi mandal dbul te /
T02TD2121E:161b-18: mandal tshad dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2121E:161b-21: aom buddha manydzu shr'i na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161b-22: aom badzra satva h'um na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161b-23: aom badzra ranta h'um na ma;/
T02TD2121E:161b-24: aom bazra padma h'um na ma:/
T02TD2121E:161b-27: de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD2121E:161b-28: de bas phyag bya ste chos sku longs sku sprul sku nyid //
T02TD2121E:161b-29: gzha' tshon nam mkha' dbyer med kyang //
T02TD2121E:161b-30: rnam snan mi bskyod rin chen 'byung //
T02TD2121E:161b-31: snang mtha' don yod grub pa la //
T02TD2121E:161b-32: lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2121E:161b-33: gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po //
T02TD2121E:161b-34: ye shes sgron mas rab brgyan cing //
T02TD2121E:161b-35: 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'i //
T02TD2121E:161b-37: mchod pa gong dang mthun pa bshams nas dge ba'i rtsa bar bsdo ba yan chad gong dang mthun /
T02TD2121E:161b-38: de nas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol /
T02TD2121E:161b-39: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu /
T02TD2121E:161b-40: yi ge brgya pa'i bshags pa bya /
T02TD2121E:161b-41: bla ma'i mandal yi dam gyi mandal gyi cho ga 'bro lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
